snippet: "There are some things that you just can't imagine happening in your life," Mitt Romney said. "This is one of them."
abstract: "There are some things that you just can't imagine happening in your life," Mitt Romney said. "This is one of them."

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and TRIP GABRIEL

lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - Donald Trump endorsed Mitt Romney here Thursday afternoon in a joint appearance that lasted less than seven minutes and included no questions.

headline.main: Trump Endorses Romney in a 7-Minute Appearance
